title: Watsonx.ai SaaS with Assistant and Governance automation
introduction: The Watsonx.ai SaaS with Assistant and Governance deployable architecture automates the deployment and setup of the IBMÂ® watsonx platform in an IBM Cloud account. The IBM watsonx platform is made of several services working together to offer AI capabilities to end users, who can explore them using IBM watsonx projects.
